nodes.text: The Amarills-class freighter was a type of freighter. The ships included multiple rooms, an airlock, and a kitchen. The slaver known just as Captain owned one such vessel prior to the Battle of Yavin. The freedom fighter-turned escapee Jyn Erso was sent their to alter documents after being captured by Allehander Pso.
The Amarills-class freighter appears in the 2017 novel Rebel Rising by Beth Revis.
